message.content:
cs.CV, cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.IR. 

The paper deals with automatic image description, which is a subfield of computer vision (cs.CV). The error analysis and categorization of errors involve natural language processing (NLP) techniques, which falls under the category of computational linguistics (cs.CL). The use of attention-based models and evaluation using text-based similarity metrics suggests a focus on machine learning (cs.LG) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI). Finally, the paper also involves information retrieval (cs.IR) as it deals with generating relevant descriptions for images.
